content: You only need to kill one Poison Chief to unlock the journal entry, but there are four in the area, so we’ve included information on how to find each one below.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 1'.
The content is as follows:
You only need to kill one Poison Chief to unlock the journal entry, but there are four in the area, so we’ve included information on how to find each one below.
